Class FactoryRegistry

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    A durable factory registry.

      • register

        public static void register(DurableFactory durableFactory)
        Register a durable factory.
        Parameters:
        durableFactory - The factory to be registered.

      • readId

        public static DurableFactory readId(java.nio.ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Read an id and map it to a durable factory instance.
        Parameters:
        byteBuffer - The byte buffer to be read.
        Returns:
        The durable factory instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when the durable id is not recognized.

      • getDurableFactory

        public static DurableFactory getDurableFactory(java.lang.Object durable)
        Map a durable object to an durable factory instance. Nulls are mapped to the registered NullFactory.
        Parameters:
        durable - The durable object, or null.
        Returns:
        The durable factory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the durable class is not recognized.
